author: Marion Dakers
title: Aviva works on its 'restoration project' as new sales rise 25pc
text: Aviva works on its 'restoration project' as new sales rise 25pc Insurance group is cutting costs after buying Friends Life earlier this year Aviva has found Â£63m in savings from its tie-up with Friends Life By Marion Dakers , Financial Services Editor 1:11PM BST 06 Aug 2015
